short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tweak meeples in BGA Carcassonne games

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance and personalize your Carcassonne experience on BoardGameArena.com with our meeple customization tool.

Key Features:
* Personalized Meeple Colours: Change the colours of your meeples for a customized look and feel.
* Improved Visibility for Better Gameplay: Struggling to distinguish meeples? Add distinct borders or backgrounds, and choose colours that stand out, enhancing the game's accessibility for those with visual impairments.
* User-Friendly Design: Simple and intuitive, just click on a meeple in the right hand side and change its appearance.
